name: Friday night funkin corruption, but bad
name_original: Friday night funkin corruption, but bad
description:
Hey , have you ever wondered?

"Hey! people have been making corruption mods based off popular mods! when are people gonna make corruption, but bad?"

Well now it's here!

crediting people so I don't get called a mod idea stealer:

Supercario - Made the FIRST ever corruption but bad mod

and then... This mod is made my me! obviously
